creditline: Gift of Daniel Avchen and David Johnson
description: abstract, chaotic image with black ink on white paper; cloudlike forms at top; black horizontal swirl wrapping around highly abstracted horse-like figures upper C; drip, splatter, and scribble marks; jagged lines forming triangular markings LLQ; vertical swirl at LL; black bubble pattern LRQ
provenance: Daniel Avchen, Minnneapolis; given to MIA, 2017
signed: top edge L, in pencil: 9/5/85 Carroll Dunham 28/51
title: Accelerator
